name: The Twilight Trials.
description: The tidally locked world, Trinumbra, is divided into 3 factions. Akumi discovers a cave in his village and finds a book about the relics of the 3 factions, guarded by their embodiments of the stones. Follow Akumi on his journey throughout the different regions to defeat the guardians and collect the relics in order to break the tidal lock of the world.
